casebody.data:
LAMAR ADVERTISING OF PENN, LLC, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
TOWNSHIP OF UNION, Defendant,
and
Township of Union Zoning Board of Adjustment, Defendant-Petitioner. C-590 September Term 2017
080468 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 9, 2018 **156To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003760-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

**157It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
